bibl.title: Private Associations in the Ptolemaic Fayyum: The Evidence of Demotic Accounts.
New Archaeological and Papyrological Researches on the Fayyum. Proceedings of the International Meeting of Egyptology and Papyrology, Lecce, June 8th-10th, 2005
bibl.author: MONSON, Andrew

bibl.note: A case study: Tebtynis. - [Introduction.] - The Egyptian tradition of associations. - Membership in Tebtynis associations. - Annual office holders. - Financial contributions. - Associations of women. - Demotic and Greek Accounts. - Conclusion.
MONSON Andrew, Private Associations in the Ptolemaic Fayyum: The Evidence of Demotic Accounts.

Mario CAPASSO and Paola DAVOLI (Edd.), New Archaeological and Papyrological Researches on the Fayyum. Proceedings of the International Meeting of Egyptology and Papyrology, Lecce, June 8th-10th, 2005 = Papyrologica Lupiensia. 14/2005 (Galatina, 2007) pp. 179-196, 4 tabl., 1 graphique.
